name: 雪鹰领主
detailed_description:
Snow Eagle Lord, a magnum opus of Oriental immortals, is an aesthetic new world!

"Snow Eagle Lord" is a 3-D beauty fairy swordsman game. It's also a real and fantastic world of games, rich and varied equipment, special effects and gorgeous skills, and a good battle will definitely give you an excellent experience. Players can experience high-quality game experience by simplifying operations, releasing skills automatically and innovating ways of playing. Easy upgrade, chatter on the battlefield, enjoy the super pleasure of worship! Off-line hang-up, fair trade, on-line login to send the best magenta, civilian players no longer need to worry! Come on, fight side by side with your brothers! Let's write a story of fairy chivalry without regret!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7-win10
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7-win10
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card:
